Clipblast website

Cornelis G.A. Kolbach, December, 1, 2007

ClipBlast! is a Video Index, Search and Navigation Platform. ClipBlast! technology helps Viewers search, navigate, watch and personalise their experience with the Video Web.

The Clipblast website was awarded with an Interactive Media Award in the categories Entertainment and Search Engine/Directory.

The Clipblast website was awarded with an Interactive Media Award in the categories Entertainment and Search Engine/Directory.
